mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user_seeker_info(seeker_id, ename, cname, military, bohun, disabled, nation, profile) VALUES(user_seeker_info_seq.NEXTVAL, #{ename}, #{cname}, #{military}, #{bohun}, #{disabled}, #{nation}, #{profile})
mapper.update: UPDATE user_seeker_info SET ename = #{ename}, cname = #{cname}, military = #{military}, bohun = #{bohun}, disabled = #{disabled}, nation = #{nation}, profile = #{profile}
mapper.select: SELECT ename, cname, military, bohun, disabled, nation, profile FROM user_seeker_info WHERE id=#{VALUE}
